Title: Patriot Acts
Plot: Patriotism is in the air as Alan and Denny celebrate their acceptance into the Auxiliary Coast Guard. But when the town of Concord, Massachusetts decides to secede from the United States, Alan accepts the case, and deeply offends Denny. The case takes a personal turn when Denny represents the opposing side in court.
Writer: David E. Kelley, Jonathan Shapiro, Sanford Golden, K
GuestStars: Jude Ciccolella (Gen. Robert Seagram), Henry Gibson (Judge Clark Brown), Anthony Heald (Judge Harvey Cooper), Michael Mantell (Mayor Thomas Steinbrenner), Richard McGonagle (A.A.G. Norman Wood)
